channel.title: Eclipse-RS New Project!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i620.photobucket.com/albums/tt282/rickytuga/forum-banner.gif[/img]
[COLOR=teal]Project -> Eclipse-RS Source used: TokkulScape Hello fellows, sorry for not being any active at all here for those who wanted to join. But I'm back for good now some college and here there just finishing up.
So, what I really wanted to restart was my "new" project, which is not really new. My imagination is not just to have a runescape server with cool models etc... It is to get the best of runescape back here!!!
Right now im helping my friend with his server a bit to learn some variables etc. Im progressing good.
But what I really want is to have a good experianced or even non experianced team that are willing to learn and do some Java
and edits.
I want to bring up Real Runescape like how it was just before the NoMoreWild Update.
I will appreciate anyones contribution for this.
[/COLOR][COLOR=Red][B][size=15pt]Current Teams:
[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=Blue][B][COLOR=Red]317 server:
[/COLOR][COLOR=Black]Owner/Coder: Chase Coder: Kevin [/COLOR][COLOR=Black]Admins and Mods will be active server players.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]508 server:
[/COLOR][COLOR=Black]Owner/Coder: Ricky[/COLOR][COLOR=Black](me) Coder: Open Spot Coder: Open Spot Admins and Mods will be active server players.[/size][/COLOR][/B][/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[CENTER] Applications For:
Group:
[COLOR=red]Website:[/COLOR] Design PHP HTML [COLOR=red]Client:[/COLOR] Models Maps Maintain [COLOR=red]Source:[/COLOR] SQL Java
Edits:
[COLOR=blue]Team:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Developers:
[/COLOR] [COLOR=red] Side Developers: (Required Test For Main Developers)
(empty)
(empty)
(empty)
(empty)
(empty)
(empty)[/COLOR]
[B]SOME OF V1 UPDATES[/B]
[ul][*]Took out exp lamp [*]Took out event area [*]Took out white mask from shop and replaced it. [*]Made berets wearable [*]Added Berets to the shops [*]Made ::master ::pure ::modarmor ::cash for mod+ [*]Added Oblesik for training summoning! But most go someplace like edgeville to train it, I'll show picture bellow. But most wait 6-10 seconds inbetween! [*]Blouse's now wearable! [*]Changed the monster's that are summoned out! They are now attackable! [*]Giving them each they're own amount of hp and attack! [*]Changed Starter, auto 50 range when you log in. [*]Fixed some glitchs/bugs [*]Fixed some drop rates [*]Added 100% Spirit Beast Attackable! [*]100% Spirit Beast area with drops! Must have decent prayer in order to fight it! And should fight in group (Very Powerful)! They re-spawn every 210 seconds, three minutes and 30 seconds in between, give you time to get more food and get ready for another battle! [*]Added 100% Prayer potion drinking, re-heals your prayer! And they're added into potion shop in edgeville! [*]New Sweet Shop [*]All sweets are 100% Working, different ones heal different amount, some heal 3 some heal 4. [*]All sweets are stackable! [*]100% Magic Potions, in Potion Shop now too! [*]Saradomin Special now heals prayer and hitpoints when special is used on npcs! [*]Added 100% custom teleports by magic tab! [*]Added a new part to yell system, updated! [*]New Mutant Tarn Area! [*]New items in pk shop! [*]Can't walk away while banking/trading [*]Took out Santa from shop. [*]Working Trade!! [*]Working Bank Note!! [*]Working Jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute! [*]Working rep and pk points system! [*]Working Kc and new Safety Dungeon System! [*]Added some things to shops. [*]More custom items added [*]Membership added [*]Slightly better pking system [*]Granite Maul Special added! [*]Temp muted only works about 60% [*]New Client items, updated a little bit, girls can now be seen wearing some items slightly. [*]Client auto directs you to server! [*]More commands! [*]New member items only! [*]Pure command fixed! [*]Fixed some other commands and much much more![/ul]
[B]Server Pictures V1![/B] [B]Quest and Teleports Part I[/B] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/52nscy.jpg[/img]
[B]Quest and Teleports Part II[/B] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2rw6mip.jpg[/img]

There's more that I didn't put.. Like some areas, all the stats, duel arena, minigames and godwars.

Thanks,
Ricky [/CENTER]

item.title: Eclipse-RS New Project!
item.dc:creator: @ricky-v ricky-v
item.description:
@ricky-v wrote:

[CENTER]

forum-banner.gif967×175

[COLOR=teal]Project -> Eclipse-RS
Source used: TokkulScape
Hello fellows, sorry for not being any active at all here for those who wanted to join.
But
I’m back for good now some college and here there just finishing up.

So, what I really wanted to restart was my “new” project, which is not really new.
My imagination is not just to have a runescape server with cool models etc…
It is to get the best of runescape back here!!!

Right now im helping my friend with his server a bit to learn some variables etc. Im progressing good.

But what I really want is to have a good experianced or even non experianced team that are willing to learn and do some Java

and edits.

I want to bring up Real Runescape like how it was just before the NoMoreWild Update.

I will appreciate anyones contribution for this.

[/COLOR][COLOR=Red][B][size=15pt]Current Teams:

[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=Blue][B][COLOR=Red]317 server:

[/COLOR][COLOR=Black]Owner/Coder: Chase
Coder: Kevin
[/COLOR][COLOR=Black]Admins and Mods will be active server players.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Red]508 server:

[/COLOR][COLOR=Black]Owner/Coder: Ricky[/COLOR]COLOR=Black
Coder: Open Spot
Coder: Open Spot
Admins and Mods will be active server players.[/size][/COLOR][/B][/COLOR] [/CENTER]

[CENTER]
Applications For:

Group:

[COLOR=red]Website:[/COLOR]
Design
PHP
HTML
[COLOR=red]Client:[/COLOR]
Models
Maps
Maintain
[COLOR=red]Source:[/COLOR]
SQL
Java

Edits:

[COLOR=blue]Team:[/COLOR]

[COLOR=green]Developers:

[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]
Side Developers: (Required Test For Main Developers)

(empty)

(empty)

(empty)

(empty)

(empty)

(empty)[/COLOR]

SOME OF V1 UPDATES

[ul][]Took out exp lamp
[]Took out event area
[]Took out white mask from shop and replaced it.
[]Made berets wearable
[]Added Berets to the shops
[]Made ::master ::pure ::modarmor ::cash for mod+
[]Added Oblesik for training summoning! But most go someplace like edgeville to train it, I’ll show picture bellow. But most wait 6-10 seconds inbetween!
[]Blouse’s now wearable!
[]Changed the monster’s that are summoned out! They are now attackable!
[]Giving them each they’re own amount of hp and attack!
[]Changed Starter, auto 50 range when you log in.
[]Fixed some glitchs/bugs
[]Fixed some drop rates
[]Added 100% Spirit Beast Attackable!
[]100% Spirit Beast area with drops! Must have decent prayer in order to fight it! And should fight in group (Very Powerful)! They re-spawn every 210 seconds, three minutes and 30 seconds in between, give you time to get more food and get ready for another battle!
[]Added 100% Prayer potion drinking, re-heals your prayer! And they’re added into potion shop in edgeville!
[]New Sweet Shop
[]All sweets are 100% Working, different ones heal different amount, some heal 3 some heal 4.
[]All sweets are stackable!
[]100% Magic Potions, in Potion Shop now too!
[]Saradomin Special now heals prayer and hitpoints when special is used on npcs!
[]Added 100% custom teleports by magic tab!
[]Added a new part to yell system, updated!
[]New Mutant Tarn Area!
[]New items in pk shop!
[]Can’t walk away while banking/trading
[]Took out Santa from shop.
[]Working Trade!!
[]Working Bank Note!!
[]Working Jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute!
[]Working rep and pk points system!
[]Working Kc and new Safety Dungeon System!
[]Added some things to shops.
[]More custom items added
[]Membership added
[]Slightly better pking system
[]Granite Maul Special added!
[]Temp muted only works about 60%
[]New Client items, updated a little bit, girls can now be seen wearing some items slightly.
[]Client auto directs you to server!
[]More commands!
[]New member items only!
[]Pure command fixed!
[]Fixed some other commands and much much more![/ul]
